page.title: 10RECREATION
page.content: In the Biggar area there is a great deal of interest in {Recreation.}One of the most popular sports in the area is {Rugby} and usually three teams are playing every weeekend in the season.{ {Golf} is another popular pastime and the Municipal Golf Course at Biggar is well patronized. Next to the Golf course is a small boating pond and a caraavan site ,where a few permanent caravans are to be found.One rereational facility,which people have been wanting for a long time is a { {Swimming Pool,}but this seems unlikely due to the present economic climate . For those people less inclined to sporting activities,there are a number of Leisure courses run in the Gillespie centre and Biggar High School.
